Structs/Vocabulary/Selector.html#/s:21Si.name: prefix(_:)
Structs/Vocabulary/Selector.html#/s:21Si.abstract: Take the list from its initial word up to a maximum number

Structs/Vocabulary/Selector.html#/s:21Si.name: suffix(_:)
Structs/Vocabulary/Selector.html#/s:21Si.abstract: Take a list from its end up to a maximum number

Structs/Vocabulary/Selector.html#/s:21Si.name: sample(_:)
Structs/Vocabulary/Selector.html#/s:21Si.abstract: Take a random sample with given size from a list

Structs/Vocabulary/WordList.html#/s:21Si.name: path
Structs/Vocabulary/WordList.html#/s:21Si.abstract: The file path of the text file containing the word list

Structs/Vocabulary/WordList.html#/s:21Si.name: parse()
Structs/Vocabulary/WordList.html#/s:21Si.abstract: Try to load the file and split into words

Structs/Vocabulary/WordList.html#/s:21Si.name: load()
Structs/Vocabulary/WordList.html#/s:21Si.abstract: Try to load the file as string

Structs/Vocabulary/WordList.html#/s:21Si.name: init(from:)
Structs/Vocabulary/WordList.html#/s:21Si.abstract: Initialize a word list from a decoder

Structs/Vocabulary/WordList.html#/s:21Si.name: encode(to:)
Structs/Vocabulary/WordList.html#/s:21Si.abstract: Encode a word list to an encoder

Structs/Vocabulary/Selector.html.name: Selector
Structs/Vocabulary/Selector.html.abstract: A descriptor of a selector for taking a part of a list

Structs/Vocabulary.html#/s:21SimulationD.name: base
Structs/Vocabulary.html#/s:21SimulationD.abstract: The word list the vocabulary is based on

Structs/Vocabulary.html#/s:21SimulationD.name: select
Structs/Vocabulary.html#/s:21SimulationD.abstract: The part to take from the base word list

Structs/BegriffixSimulation.html#/s:21Si.name: conditions
Structs/BegriffixSimulation.html#/s:21Si.abstract: A list of game descriptions that should be played in a simulation

Structs/BegriffixSimulation.html#/s:21Si.name: process()
Structs/BegriffixSimulation.html#/s:21Si.abstract: Play the games in conditions and assign the results to the result property accordingly

Structs/Info.html#/s:21SimulationDescrip.name: filename
Structs/Info.html#/s:21SimulationDescrip.abstract: A filename string composed of game, title and date

Structs/BegriffixSimulation.html.name: BegriffixSimulation
Structs/BegriffixSimulation.html.abstract: A game simulation where AI players can play against each other

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: ISOStringFromDate(date:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns a string conforming to ISO 8601 from a date

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: dateFromISOString(string:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Parses a ISO 8601 string into a date

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: init(_:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Initialize a date from an ISO 8601 formatted string

Extensions/DateFormatter.html#/s:So15NSD.name: ISOFormatter()
Extensions/DateFormatter.html#/s:So15NSD.abstract: Returns a formatter which can convert between dates and strings representing dates in ISO 8601 format
